description: Explore how Rarible leverages open source principles to create a sustainable digital ecosystem within the blockchain and NFT space. This article discusses the integration of open source governance, financial sustainability, transparency, and community involvement in Rarible's approach to empowering digital creators.
keywords: Rarible, open source, blockchain, NFT, sustainability, decentralized, governance, community, financial sustainability, transparency, digital ecosystem
title: Rarible's Approach to Open Source Sustainability
